about_the_game:
TikTok： Mo1111AI

Rhythm with Tempo Cube!
This is a rhythm game, Cube will bounce between walls and blocks to rhythm with the music. Use WASD along the move directions at the right time to score and combo!
You may upload your own midi file to create your custom game scene! Rhythm with Tempo Cube!
This is a rhythm game, Cube will bounce between walls and blocks to rhythm with the music. Use WASD along the move directions at the right time to score and combo!
You may upload your own midi file to create your custom game scene!

name: Tempo Cube

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-4350v
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Rhythm with Tempo Cube! This is a rhythm game, Cube will bounce between walls and blocks to rhythm with the music. Use WASD along the move directions at the right time to score and combo! You may upload your own midi file to create your custom game scene!
